Reviews.Content: overall experience aruna disappointing price restaurant contrary indicated site booked neither roof terrace accessible breakfast served windowless dining below ground level breakfast included fresh fruit juice basic quality standard shabby sold deluxe bathtub blocked visit hotels hammam included price visit heated nor pool filled massages cleaning lady charged extra irritating policy constantly trying sell overpriced additional services tours etc bit ripoff

Reviews.Content: hotel pleasant stay location near historical sites istanbulthe stuff friendly nice spoke english help gothe breakfast lot options tasty

Reviews.Content: aruna boutique hotel value money 25 guess means hardly people decor expensive unlike budget hotel usually basic facilities hotel scores regard main desk manned staff versed english friendly hotel deal local limo service provider hence services main city airport ataturk outskirts sabiha economical dont break head explaining location driver guide tourist locations ferry services finer details hotel locality quiet city sultanahmet 1015 minutes walk major tourist sultanahmet square blue mosque cistern grand bazaar tourist foot railway station nearby walk 10 minutes sultanahmet square local tram breakfast nice spread arent huge sufficient store luggage stretch legs stayed double clean nice balcony crammed streets city provide free wifi plus reconnect world outside backpackers andor couples looking quick stopover istanbul couple kids kids size checked

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Good Location and excellent breakfast!”

Reviews.Content: lovely stay aruna hotel staff spoke english helpful location excellent city 5 minutes nice promenade walk 2 minutes breakfast couldnt boiled eggs fruit nuts excellent coffee tried sauna nice missed restaurant closed evening plenty aways corner definitely stay hotel return istanbul

Reviews.Content: stayed aruna hotel august 2011 upgraded sitting bed comfortable clean staff friendly helpful hotel close walk town square highly recommend hotel hotel maybe 10 nice breakfast included price

Reviews.Content: spent wonderfull 5 days aruna hotel arrive hotel spent 1 hour reception information giving huge information city facilities city map historical buildings ready visit city information helpful giving notebook free

Reviews.Content: low season pleasant 5days stay staff manager truly helpful manager free upgrade suite helped buy turkish delight souvenir quality cheap price turk friend hotel hotel boss free ride home hospitality

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”

Reviews.Content: hotel istanbul 40 euros clean aruna surprise clean bugs close main attractions taxi driver trouble situated street fast receptionist friendly helpfull expected price cheap bad looking sleep 5star hotel fine

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money in central position”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel late lucky proved excellent value money location step blue mosque meaning short walk central sights traffic excellent nights sleep tiny comfy minibar aircon didnt november bed provided nights sleep bathroom clean shower tho breakfast plentyful varied mornings hadnt tasted offer besides usual buffet stuff omelette spiced slightly chili powder

Reviews.Title: “Good value hotel”
Reviews.Author: DJGSydney
Reviews.Content: husband stayed aruna 8 nights time istanbul decided aruna reading reviews trip advisor hotel nice yilmaz manager helpful keen assist breakfast spread coffee location residential little street noise mentioned previous reviews short walk major sights restaurants shops little hotel doorslamming people coming hotel late night dont care sleeping booked suite space welldesigned little cramped dark bed comfortable spotlessly clean despite negative comments thoroughly enjoyed stay aruna believe value money
